file_content.text: M9-08 = authorized for communication + data processing // M9-08 = on standby
M9-08 = receiving narrowband transmission // Content = recorded message
This is Darth Malgus to designated strike teams. We have an emergency situation.
The Imperial dreadnaught Red Reaper and its master, Darth Ikoral, have been located in the Bormea Sector.
By order of the Dark Council, Ikoral and his crew have been declared traitors and must be eliminated. We strike immediately; tell no one of this.
What do you know about this Sith Lord? Why would he be declared a traitor?
Darth Ikoral = recipient of the Emperor's Blessing + member of the Order of Ragnos // Declaration as traitor = unusual
Darth Ikoral's last known appearance = seventy years ago
A secret mission to kill a renegade Sith Lord, with no details and no explanation. It doesn't inspire trust.
Killing a Darth could be fun.
Report to Vaiken Spacedock + contact Darth Malgus for briefing // M9-08 = deleting record of this interaction
M9-08 = authorized for communication + data processing // M9-08 = on standby
